FuncDef: This command associates an IP filter policy with an IP interface.

ParaDef.Info: The filter name acts as the ID for the IP filter policy expressed as a decimal integer. The filter policy must already exist within the config>filter>ip context. Values-1 to 16384.

The filter name acts as the ID for the IPv6 filter policy expressed as a decimal integer. The filter policy must already exist within the config>filter>ipv6 context. This parameter only applies to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS. Values-1 to 65535.
